entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
